description: This intermediate level course assumes the student has a substantial understanding of ceramic processes, plus a good awareness of his or her own interests in the realm of ceramic expression. The instructor helps students focus their efforts by proposing specific areas of investigation. Prerequisites: Art 116 or 119. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor. Lab fee. Offered annually.
name: Ceramics
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Art 116 or 119. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor. Lab fee. Offered annually.
